publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-2767.1 Michael McMahon: British-Irish Council—As an amendment to motion (S3M-2767) in the name of John Swinney, leave out from "Scottish ministers’" to end and insert "proposal for the Council to take forward a workstream on renewable energy; encourages Scottish ministers to work in co-operation with all the members of the British-Irish Council, and encourages them to continue to support the Council in addressing issues of real and common concern." Motions and amendments which have attracted additional support
